video.title: Ash vs. Evil Dead
video.synopsis: Thirty years later, Ash Williams -- demon hunter par excellence -- is back to battle a new Deadite plague. He may have lost a hand, but not his touch.

episodes.synopsis: Ash's humdrum life is upended by a disturbing vision and a couple of co-workers. Agent Amanda Fisher gets a crash course in Deadite 101.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: As Amanda tracks Ash, Pablo experiences a bloody showdown. Meanwhile, Kelly receives a phone call that raises Ash's suspicions.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: While Ash searches for a man with curse-breaking powers, a mysterious woman stumbles upon Kelly's parents' farm.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Ash, Kelly and Pablo make a hasty retreat to follow a new lead, but the trio has a tail. Meanwhile, Ruby makes a dramatic entrance.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Kelly and Pablo seek help with Ash's demonic diagnosis, but not all is what it seems. Ruby gives the increasingly incredulous Amanda a pep talk.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Ruby bites off more than she can chew, much to Amanda's horror. Ash shares his plan of attack with Kelly and Pablo, but there's a catch.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: In need of firepower, Ash, Kelly, Pablo and Amanda visit a well-armed militia, but the friends quickly discover that something else got there first.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Determined to face his literal demons, an on-edge Ash returns to the cabin where it all began. Meanwhile, Pablo and Kelly meet hikers in the woods.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Ash and his doppelgänger have Kelly and Pablo seeing double. Later, visitors drop by the cabin at a most inconvenient time.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Things come to a head at the cabin, where Kelly struggles to free Pablo from the book, and Ruby makes Ash a tempting offer.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Ash, Pablo and Kelly get a message from Ruby and head north to Elk Grove, Michigan, where trouble -- and Ash's dad -- await.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Pablo gets a surprising bit of news from Ruby regarding the Necronomicon. Ash learns he and his dad have something in common.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: After teenage no-goodniks steal the Delta, Ash and Chet orchestrate a plan to get back the car -- and the Necronomicon -- once and for all.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: While Kelly and Ruby tangle with something nasty, Pablo goes for a ride against his will, and Ash is forced to improvise.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: After local law enforcement stumbles onto a grisly crime scene, Ash is taken down to the station, where he receives a mysterious phone call.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: While Ash and his friends hunker down in Brock's besieged house, Ruby digs deep to summon a much-needed spell.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Ash wakes up to discover that everything he's ever experienced is being called into question by an oddly helpful doctor.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: To track down Ash and rescue him, Ruby, Pablo and Kelly head deep into an abandoned asylum, where they encounter Sheriff Emery -- and a fearsome enemy.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Things get trippy when Ash's attempts to right a wrong lead to unforeseen consequences. Meanwhile, Ruby and Kelly run into trouble among the trees.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: While Ruby and Kelly fight for a Pablo-esque future, Ash challenges Baal to a one-on-one duel that could determine both their fates.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: As Ash prepares for the grand opening of his hardware store/sex emporium, an old flame stops by with some shocking news about their past.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Ruby's unholy bun in the oven wants out. Ash  -- aka Cool Dad -- struggles to bond with Brandy. Kelly's new buddy rubs Pablo the wrong way.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: An old flame puts the moves on Ash, but he's not exactly in the mood. Dalton, Pablo and Kelly take a road trip. Brandy offers her dad an out.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: While an unexpected visitor takes Ash on a trip down memory lane, Kelly and Brandy hunker down against an old friend who isn't quite himself.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Ash battles a troublesome toddler with a daddy complex. Kelly deals with a nasty wound while trying to talk some sense into Pablo.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Kelly pays Ruby a visit -- with guns blazing. Meanwhile, Ash and Brandy do their best to lay low, but the Knights of Sumeria have other ideas.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Brandy reveals her battle plan, but Ash isn't too keen on the strategy. Meanwhile, Ruby welcomes a new addition and Pablo has a vision.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: The police widen their search for Ash. Pablo gives voice to a dangerous plan. Brandy bumps into a familiar face in unfamiliar territory.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: As Ruby and Kelly go the extra mile to put the hurt on Zoe, a bookish Pablo talks end-game strategy with Ash and Brandy.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: As Elk Grove -- and the world -- descends into chaos, Ash strives to prove his mettle by taking on a gigantic Kandarian demon.
episodes.title: Episode 10
